meanings.sent1: She is an overcommunicates person, always sharing every detail of her day.
meanings.sent2: The overcommunicates coworker sends multiple emails about the same project.
meanings.sent3: The overcommunicates parrot never stops squawking, driving everyone crazy.
meanings.sent4: His overcommunicates enthusiasm for the project was evident in every meeting.
meanings.sent5: The overcommunicates waterfall seemed to never run out of words as it cascaded down the rocks.
